backpacks.name: Backpacks
backpacks.description: Find your trekking backpack with many functionalities, such as drinking systems, rain covers, etc.

tents.name: Tents
tents.description: E-Shop offers a variety tents including family tents.

clothing.name: Clothing
clothing.description: Be prepared for even the most extreme conditions with this range of clothing that's perfect for going Hiking & Trekking.

footwear.name: Footwear
footwear.description: See the best hiking shoes and boots for men and women. Shop the best trail and waterproof hiking shoes.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.description: When hiking in hot and/or humid conditions, one litre per hour is generally recommended.

accesories.name: Accesorii
accesories.description: Our accessories will allow you to hike with your trekking poles in all 4 seasons.
